blog.name: 0283_move_zeroes.md

pageProps.html:
Move Zeroes

Description

Solutions

First Idea

/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
 */
var moveZeroes = function (nums) {
  let zeroIdx = -1

  for (let i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
    if (nums[i] === 0 && zeroIdx < 0) {
      zeroIdx = i
      continue
    }

    if (nums[i] !== 0 && zeroIdx >= 0) {
      nums[zeroIdx++] = nums[i]
      nums[i] = 0
    }
  }
}

-- Time Complexity: O(n) -- Space Complexity: O(1)

Refined Version

/**
 * @param {number[]} nums
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify nums in-place instead.
 */
var moveZeroes = function (nums) {
  let zeroIdx = nums.indexOf(0)
  if (zeroIdx < 0) {
    return
  }

  for (let i = zeroIdx + 1; i < nums.length; i++) {
    if (nums[i] !== 0) {
      nums[zeroIdx++] = nums[i]
      nums[i] = 0
    }
  }
}

-- Time Complexity: O(n) -- Space Complexity: O(1)
